title: Macro Math (in progress)
description: Macro Math is a React app designed to make calculating macronutrients a lot easier for gym goers who like to cook their own recipes. I am the sole contributor of this project and created the Figma prototype myself. My next step is to start a GitHub repo and start coding before finishing the prototype.

title: Personal website
description: I created this website from scratch using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. I created a Figma prototype of how I wanted to update it from when I was in college, when I used Bootstrap components.

title: This Is Where
description: For my Web Dev class, a classmate and I chose to create This Is Where, an app where people can share a sentiment that is connected to a place in time in the SF Bay Area. It was built with a React frontend and Node backend

title: DTR
description: For my Web Dev class, a classmate and I chose to create Dater, an app for after the first date. Users can log dates with other users and answer questions to discover compatibility. It was built with a Node backend and vanilla JS frontend.
